entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Weird Pushasync Bug on physical device #8400
  • Labels added in code are not displayed on Android #8395
  • .NET MAUI Blazor mouse events not firing #8393
  • Binding to color properties does not work #8390
  • CollectionView with GridItemsLayout: Issues when changing Span #8387
  • #if WINDOWS does not compile #8382
  • `Border` with `CornerRadius` doesn't clip its content #8381
  • Allow local files (PWA app) in WebView (CORS) #8380
  • Add guide how to connect to any service hosted at localhost from real device connected through Visual Studio #8379
  • [iOS] FilePicker: File.Exist() not working and inconsistent behavior (read/write) | missing documentation #8378
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerExceptionon picker if property bound to ItemDisplayBinding is null #8377
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crash on Windows platform when call Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #8372
    6.0-servicing
  • Binding a converter parameter to a viewmodel object returns bindable property for that object in the converter and not the value. #8371
  • [MacCatalyst] Content in ScrollView does not resize when the Window resize. #8370
    6.0-servicing

Closed

  • cannot debug or show output of Release built application on Android #6567
    6.0-servicing
  • Element measurement related API should use platforms units for all platforms #4704
    6.0-servicing
  • WinUI layout bugged #8238
  • Custom style not getting applied to Button #6064
    6.0-servicing
  • Drag and drop leads to crash #6684
    6.0-servicing
  • On Android CollectionView selection and scroll not working properly #7053
    6.0-servicing
  • MainActivity ScreenOrientation = ScreenOrientation.SensorPortrait #8284
  • App crashes when installed from apk, works from debugger #5781
    6.0-servicing
  • MAUI.NET App: Infinite assertion failure in UIKit.UIApplication due to absolete code usage. (NSInternalInconsistencyException) #8074
  • [Mac] MAUI app targeting net6.0-maccatalyst crashes if some NuGets are referenced. #7179
  • Android is not just Phones Feature requests #6144
  • iOS publishing not picking up project runtime identifier #6992
  • BorderColor does not work on visualStateManager #6370
    6.0-servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout problem with two BoxView(s) #5756
    6.0-servicing
  • [Mac][Windows] Desktop applications require easy programmatic access to the Mouse and Keyboard #4498
  • What is the method of moving the mouse over a control？ #3669
  • Mouse & Keyboard Input #7900
  • Button text not updating after button click #8332
  • [IOS] Building and debugging related issues #6624
    6.0-servicing
  • Toolbar moves when overflow button is pressed #6199
    6.0-servicing
  • SwipeItem command not executed #8315
  • [Windows] RefreshView and ContentView are not firing commands when using mouse. #8016
  • Error "The specified deps.json ... does not exist" #8114
  • [Bug] IsVisible doesn't work for custom controls which inherits from View #3410
  • Shell doesn't trigger OnAppearing on Second Page #8164
  • [Bug] Height of the view inside the CollectionView and extra padding inside the Grid. #7011
  • [Scenario Day] Hot Reload not working updating styles using AppThemeBinding #7133
  • Content inside a Frame layout is not visible. #7139
  • CollectionView EmptyView not working #7063
  • Android : No text labels appear in Shell Flyout. (Using Xaminals app) #7105
  • Grid with HeightRequest=0 no longer hides child elements #8105
  • Checkbox Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update) #8376
  • .NET MAUI - Label and Button does not resize to fit Text width on Android platform #8374
  • .NET MAUI - Button IsVisibble property does not function with Value Converter on Android platform #8373
  • MAUI GA #8386
  • [Android] CollectionView selection color not working #4108
    6.0-servicing
  • The style of is CollectionView selected item incorrect #7391
    6.0-servicing
  • maui debug fails on a file that does not exist #8362
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.3 Preview 2 - MAUI Comet template doesn't compile #8352
  • Windows Desktop App fails to run in administrator mode #6208
    6.0-servicing
  • Visibility binding not resize and rearrange items inside a vertical stack layout/grid/stack layout #8365

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert Android Hit Test values to Units #8399
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools
  • Remove the workaround for the WinUI targets #8397
  • Update with branch and project structure #8396
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] fix MauiSplashScreen on Android 12+ #8394
  • Remove the confusing `.` in the template tests #8392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make MAUI blazor which required android api 24 compatible to api 21 #8375
    area/blazor 🕸️

Merged

  • Revert "[housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors" #8391
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix typo #8336
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8369
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix the runner for unpackaged tests #8383
    area/testing
  • Build MAUI with dotnet build #8384
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Handler allocation tests #8177
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Return unknown if not on UI Thread for WinUI #8368
  • [X] Pass the parent scopes to DataContext #8345
    area/Xaml </>
